text: Bardala labarda is the only species in the monotypic genus Bardala, a member of the comb-footed spider family Theridiidae. It was first described by Michael I. Saaristo in 2006, and is endemic to the coral atoll of Aldabra. ==See also== * List of Theridiidae species ==References== Category:Spiders of Africa Category:Spiders described in 1983 Category:Theridiidae
title: Bardala labarda
